Name: 100 hidden turtles
About the game: Art by –ênatoliy Loginovskikh 100 hidden turtles is a hidden object game in the undersea world setting. At first black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style. Then the game becomes colored. Animated fish and algae. Colored turtles hid under water. Can you find 100 turtles? Just click on the turtle! Take care of your nerves!
